TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(object sender, DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you create a <xref:System.Net.DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates downloading a string asynchronously.
[!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#28)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#28)]
The following method is called when the download completes.
[!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#29)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#29)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#29)]
